Footer.description: A family-owned olive estate in Durrës, Albania, producing premium extra virgin olive oil for over a century.

home.title: Kallmi Estate | Premium Albanian Olive Oil

contact.title: Contact Us

Hero.subtitle: Where centuries-old olive groves meet the Adriatic Sea

home.a1: Kallmi Estate is a family-owned olive oil estate in Durrës, Albania, producing premium extra virgin olive oil for over a century. The estate also features a farm-to-table restaurant, luxury accommodations, and glamping among ancient olive groves overlooking the Adriatic Sea.
home.a2: Kallmi Estate is located in the Kallm area of Durrës, Albania, approximately 30 minutes from Tirana International Airport. The estate overlooks the Adriatic Sea and is surrounded by century-old olive groves.
home.q3: What products does Kallmi Estate offer?
home.a3: Kallmi Estate produces premium cold-pressed extra virgin olive oil from hand-harvested Albanian olives. We also offer limited edition bottles, olive oil-based products, a farm-to-table restaurant, luxury accommodations, and glamping experiences.

restaurant.q1: What type of cuisine does the Kallmi Estate restaurant serve?
restaurant.a1: Our farm-to-table restaurant serves authentic Albanian and Mediterranean cuisine, featuring dishes crafted with our estate-produced extra virgin olive oil and locally sourced seasonal ingredients from the Durrës region.
restaurant.q2: Do I need a reservation for the restaurant?
restaurant.a2: Reservations are recommended, especially during peak season from June through September. You can book a table directly through our website or by contacting us via phone or email.
restaurant.a3: The restaurant operates seasonally, typically from April through October, to ensure we serve only the freshest local ingredients. Please check our website or contact us for current opening hours and availability.

stay.q1: What types of accommodations are available at Kallmi Estate?
stay.a1: Kallmi Estate offers luxury rooms and suites nestled among olive groves, each with stunning panoramic views of the Adriatic Sea. All accommodations feature modern amenities while preserving the estate's authentic rustic charm.
stay.q2: What is included in a stay at Kallmi Estate?
stay.a2: Each stay includes a Mediterranean breakfast featuring our estate olive oil products, access to the estate grounds and olive groves, and complimentary olive oil tasting. Restaurant reservations and guided estate tours can be arranged.
stay.q3: How do I book accommodation at Kallmi Estate?
stay.a3: You can book directly through our website using the availability calendar, or contact us via email or phone. We recommend booking well in advance for the summer months (June-September) as availability is limited.

shop.q1: How is Kallmi Estate olive oil made?
shop.a1: Our extra virgin olive oil is cold-pressed within hours of hand-harvesting from century-old olive trees. The oil is unfiltered and produced in small batches to ensure the highest quality, with acidity levels consistently below 0.3%.
shop.a2: Yes, we ship our olive oil products worldwide. International shipping costs and estimated delivery times vary by destination. Visit our shop page for detailed shipping information and current availability.
shop.q3: What makes Albanian olive oil special?
shop.a3: Albania has one of the oldest olive-growing traditions in the Mediterranean, dating back over 2,000 years. The unique microclimate of the Albanian Riviera, ancient Kallinjot tree varieties, and traditional harvesting methods produce exceptionally flavorful oil rich in polyphenols and antioxidants.

camping.q1: What camping options are available at Kallmi Estate?
camping.a1: We offer both traditional camping pitches and luxury glamping tents set among our century-old olive groves. Each site provides stunning views of the Adriatic Sea, shared bathroom facilities, and access to all estate amenities.
camping.q2: What amenities are available for campers?
camping.a2: Campers enjoy access to clean bathroom facilities, electrical hookups, Wi-Fi, the estate restaurant, olive oil tastings, and guided tours of the olive groves. Our glamping tents come fully furnished with comfortable bedding.
camping.q3: When is the best time to camp at Kallmi Estate?
camping.a3: The camping season runs from May through September, with June and September offering the ideal combination of warm weather, fewer crowds, and the beautiful Mediterranean landscape at its finest.

LandingHero.subtitle1: Where ancient olive groves whisper secrets to the
LandingHero.description: Four generations of passion have cultivated this sacred land, creating Albania's hidden gem. Experience tasty food and raw nature

Landing.heritageText1: Where ancient olive trees whisper stories of generations past, our family has cultivated this sacred land with unwavering devotion.
Landing.heritageText2: Each drop carries the essence of Kallmi - a testament to our commitment to preserving Albania's finest traditions.
Landing.discoverSubtitle: Where ancient olive groves meet the Adriatic's embrace
Landing.goldenHourText: Watch the sun paint the Adriatic in shades of amber and rose, creating moments that live forever in memory
Landing.sunsetText: Every evening, the Adriatic becomes a canvas where nature paints her most breathtaking masterpiece
Landing.sunsetQuote: Here, where the ancient olive trees have witnessed countless sunsets, each evening brings a symphony of colors that reminds us why Kallmi remains Albania's best-kept secret.
Landing.ctaSubtitle: Discover the perfect blend of tradition, nature, and Albanian hospitality

RestaurantSnippet.title: Dine With Us
RestaurantSnippet.text1: Experience the authentic flavors of Albania at our estate restaurant, where we craft seasonal dishes using the freshest local ingredients, including our own olive oil harvest.
RestaurantSnippet.text2: Our menu celebrates traditional Albanian cuisine with a modern twist, letting the pure flavors of each ingredient shine. Enjoy your meal with panoramic views of our olive groves and the Adriatic coastline.

AccommodationsSnippet.title: Stay With Us
AccommodationsSnippet.text1: Immerse yourself in the serene beauty of Kallmi Estate with a stay in our boutique accommodations, nestled among centuries-old olive trees with breathtaking views of the Adriatic Sea.
AccommodationsSnippet.text2: Each room is thoughtfully designed with traditional Albanian elements and modern comforts, providing a peaceful retreat after a day of exploration. Wake up to birdsong and the gentle rustle of olive groves.

ContactPage.quote: Every drop of our olive oil carries the essence of Albanian soil, the warmth of Mediterranean sun, and the love of generations who have tended these ancient groves.

CampingPage.heroSubtitle: Sleep under {accent} and wake to breathtaking Adriatic sunrises
CampingPage.introText1: Immerse yourself in nature's embrace where centuries-old olive trees whisper stories of the past while the Adriatic Sea serenades you to sleep under a blanket of stars.
CampingPage.introText2: From rustic tent sites to luxury glamping, experience the perfect balance of adventure and comfort in Albania's most pristine coastal setting.
CampingPage.introText3: Wake to stunning sunrises, explore hidden beaches, and create memories that will last a lifetime in this untouched paradise.
CampingPage.campsitesSubtitle: From rustic tent pitches under ancient olives to luxury glamping with all amenities, find your perfect camping experience
CampingPage.site1Description: Experience camping under ancient olive trees with partial views of the Adriatic Sea. Each site includes a cleared area for your tent and access to shared facilities.
CampingPage.site2Description: Premium camping spots with direct sea views and private beach access. Enjoy the sounds of the waves as you fall asleep under the stars.
CampingPage.site3Description: Secluded camping spots nestled in a small forest area of the estate. Perfect for those seeking shade and privacy.
CampingPage.site4Description: Pre-set luxury bell tents with comfortable beds, linens, and furnishings. The perfect blend of camping and comfort.
CampingPage.bookingSubtitle: Secure your spot under the stars and create unforgettable memories in Albania's most enchanting camping destination.
CampingPage.bookingContact: For group bookings or special arrangements, contact us at
CampingPage.activitiesSubtitle: Discover endless adventures from hiking ancient trails to stargazing under pristine Albanian skies
CampingPage.activity1Description: Explore scenic trails through olive groves, along the coastline, and into nearby mountains with spectacular panoramic views.
CampingPage.activity2Description: Enjoy private access to pristine Adriatic beaches, perfect for swimming, snorkeling, and sunbathing during your stay.
CampingPage.activity3Description: Experience the magic of unpolluted night skies with guided stargazing sessions and astronomy talks.

OurStory.heroDescription2: , a lifetime of passion, and the eternal pursuit of
OurStory.heritageText1: Nestled in the sun-kissed hills of Durres, Albania, Kallmi Estate has been a testament to the art of olive oil making for over a century. Our story began with our ancestors, who recognized the unique potential of this fertile land.
OurStory.heritageText2: They planted the first olive trees that would become our legacy, understanding that this sacred land would nurture generations of liquid gold. Each tree tells a story of patience, wisdom, and unwavering dedication.
OurStory.heritageText3: Today, we continue to honor their wisdom by maintaining traditional methods while embracing modern techniques. Each bottle carries not just the pure essence of our olives, but the rich history of our land and the soul of our people.
OurStory.valuesSubtitle: The timeless principles that guide every drop of liquid gold we create
OurStory.valueTraditionDesc: We preserve century-old methods passed down through generations, ensuring each bottle tells our story of heritage and craftsmanship that spans over 100 years.
OurStory.valueQualityDesc: From harvest to bottle, we maintain the highest standards of excellence, producing olive oil that meets the most discerning palates and exceeds expectations.
OurStory.valueSustainabilityDesc: We are committed to sustainable farming practices that protect our environment and ensure our olive groves thrive for future generations to come.
OurStory.processSubtitle: Where ancient wisdom meets modern precision in every golden drop
OurStory.processStep1Desc: We carefully hand-pick our olives at the optimal moment of ripeness, ensuring each fruit contributes to the exceptional quality of our liquid gold.
OurStory.processStep2Desc: Within hours of harvest, the olives are cold-pressed in our state-of-the-art facility, preserving their natural flavors and nutritional benefits.
OurStory.processStep3Desc: This careful process results in an extra virgin olive oil of remarkable purity and character, carrying the essence of our Albanian heritage.
OurStory.legacyText1: Through generations, our family has been the custodian of these ancient olive groves. Each generation has added its own chapter to our story while maintaining the core values that make Kallmi Estate special.
OurStory.legacyText2: Today, we invite you to be part of our continuing story. Every bottle of Kallmi Estate olive oil is more than just a product -- it's a piece of our heritage, a taste of our  tradition, and a promise of our commitment to excellence.
OurStory.legacyQuote: Every drop tells a story, every bottle carries a legacy, every taste connects you to our Albanian soul.

FooterFull.brandDescription: Four generations of passion crafting Albania's finest extra virgin olive oil from ancient groves kissed by the Adriatic breeze.
FooterFull.newsletterText: Join our family and receive exclusive updates about our harvest, new products, and estate events.
FooterFull.copyright: © {year} Kallmi Estate. Crafted with ❤ in Albania.
FooterFull.quote: Every drop tells the story of our land, our family, and our unwavering commitment to preserving Albania's liquid gold.

Accommodations.heroSubtitle: Experience authentic Albanian hospitality in our boutique accommodations
Accommodations.introText1: At Kallmi Estate, we invite you to experience the genuine warmth of Albanian hospitality in our thoughtfully designed accommodations. Each room is a perfect blend of traditional elements and modern comforts.
Accommodations.introText2: Nestled among centuries-old olive trees with breathtaking views of the Adriatic Sea, our accommodations offer a peaceful retreat from the bustle of everyday life.
Accommodations.roomsSubtitle: Choose from our selection of comfortable rooms and suites
Accommodations.reservationsSubtitle: Experience the serenity of Kallmi Estate. Reserve your accommodation and create lasting memories with us.

Restaurant.heroDescription: Where authentic Albanian cuisine meets contemporary elegance, overlooking the sparkling Adriatic Sea
Restaurant.introText1: Every dish tells a story of our land, featuring the freshest catch from the Adriatic and ingredients from our own gardens, all enhanced by our estate's liquid gold.
Restaurant.introText2: Dine with panoramic views of olive groves and the sparkling sea as your backdrop, creating memories that last a lifetime.
Restaurant.menuSubtitle: Discover our carefully curated selection of fresh Adriatic seafood, vibrant salads, and traditional Albanian specialties
Restaurant.menuSeaBassDesc: Fresh catch from the Adriatic, grilled to perfection with herbs and our estate olive oil
Restaurant.menuColdOctopusSaladDesc: Tender octopus with Mediterranean herbs, olive oil, and fresh vegetables
Restaurant.menuGrilledVegetablesDesc: Red peppers and aubergines with balsamic vinegar and garlic

Restaurant.menuGreenSaladDesc: Fresh mixed greens with our signature olive oil dressing

Restaurant.menuGrilledPotatoesDesc: With oregano, crumbled feta cheese and olive oil
Restaurant.menuGrilledVegetablesAltDesc: Red peppers and aubergines with balsamic vinegar and garlic

Restaurant.eventsText1: Celebrate life's most precious moments in the stunning setting of Kallmi Estate, where every detail is crafted to perfection.
Restaurant.eventsText2: From intimate anniversaries to grand weddings, our team creates bespoke experiences with customized menus and impeccable service.
Restaurant.awardsSubtitle: Kallmi i Bukur has been recognized for our commitment to culinary excellence and outstanding dining experience.
Restaurant.awardsQuote: We're honored to be recognized for our commitment to authentic Albanian cuisine and the unforgettable experiences we create for our guests.
